name: Inversé
description:
Inversé is a retro-styled arcade platformer made for and during the Löve Jam.

Objective: Hit the colored orbs that match the background color to score as many points as possible before the timer runs out.

Every 8 seconds the background and orbs change color, making it a race to touch the orbs before the background changes. When the countdown reaches 0, the game ends and your final score is shown.

If you enjoyed the game, comment with what score you got!

Warning - People with Photosensitive Epilepsy please be advised. This game contains many flashing and high saturated colors. (It's also alot of fun)

Controls:

  • Desktop:

Arrow keys to move, space to jump.

  • Mobile:

On-screen joystick and jump button.

Running the game:

Unfamiliar with Löve and .love files? Read Here.

Inversé will work on Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, and iOS.
